definition: bound form used only in 苣蕒菜|苣荬菜[qu3 mai3 cai4]/Taiwan pr. [ju4]

sentences.english: Some people like to start their dinner with a salad of lettuce or other leafy greens.
sentences.chinese: 有人喜欢晚餐前吃盘莴苣沙拉或其它绿叶蔬菜沙拉。

sentences.english: The highest calcium content is found in collard greens, mustard greens, spinach, and swiss chard.
sentences.chinese: 其中钙含量最高的是甘蓝菜，芥菜，菠菜和唐莴苣。

sentences.english: And when the sea lettuce washes up on the beach, it smells terrible.
sentences.chinese: 而且海莴苣冲到海滩时，味道非常难闻。

sentences.english: It usually comes on a bamboo-woven platter and is laid upon a nest of green lettuce.
sentences.chinese: 牛肉片通常是装在竹编的浅盘里，铺在绿莴苣上面。

sentences.english: So why does it feel like even the lettuce is out to get us?
sentences.chinese: 那么为什么感觉甚至连莴苣都要加害我们呢？

sentences.english: First he ate some lettuces and some french beans; and then he ate some radishes.
sentences.chinese: 他先吃了一些莴苣叶子和法国豆，又吃了些小萝卜。

sentences.english: In the middle or center of your raised bed , plant lettuce of your favorite variety.
sentences.chinese: 在你苗圃床的中心种植你最喜爱品种的莴苣。

sentences.english: Then Rapunzel let down the braids of her hair, and the enchantress climbed up to her.
sentences.chinese: 莴苣姑娘立刻垂下她的发辫，女巫顺着它爬了上去。

sentences.english: Just iceberg lettuce , half a cup of garbanzos and a lemon wedge.
sentences.chinese: 卷心莴苣，半杯鹰嘴豆，夹一个柠檬。

sentences.english: A green vegetable or herb used in salad, especially lettuce.
sentences.chinese: 沙拉中使用的绿色蔬菜或食用植物，尤指莴苣。

sentences.english: I have a tomato and a lettuce salad, a tomato omelette.
sentences.chinese: 我要一份番茄莴苣沙拉，番茄煎蛋卷。

sentences.english: Rapunzel grew into the most beautiful child beneath the sun.
sentences.chinese: “莴苣”慢慢长成了天底下最漂亮的女孩。

sentences.english: Puss-in-boots placed some lettuce in the sack and hid.
sentences.chinese: 穿靴猫在麻袋里放了一些莴苣然后躲起来。

sentences.english: There was a big buck rabbit sitting calmly among the lettuces.
sentences.chinese: 一只大雄兔安静地蹲在莴苣中。

sentences.english: In America a person does not eat lettuce that way, nor pick up a soup bowl to drink what remains at he bottom.
sentences.chinese: 美国人不那样吃莴苣，也不手持汤碗喝到见底儿。

sentences.english: Mix the lettuce and the cucumber in a salad bowl.
sentences.chinese: 在沙拉碗里拌好莴苣和黄瓜。

definition: variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
Chinese broccoli/Chinese kale/cabbage mustard/Brassica oleracea var. alboglabra/also pr. [jie4 lan2]
